messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content:
Dear Voter,
I am married with two sons, and have lived in Rayleigh for 40 years. I am a Rochford District Councillor, and a Higher Courts Solicitor-Advocate (Criminal Proceedings). I ran my own practice in Southend for 27 years appearing as a Defence Solicitor in the Magistrates Courts and Crown Courts. With my experience of the real world I understand the concerns of constituents, and wish to restore their democracy free from the suffocating EU.

issues.brexitEurope: With my experience of the real world I understand the concerns of constituents, and wish to restore their democracy free from the suffocating EU.
